title: Nagpur
summary: Nagpur (Marathi pronunciation: [naːɡpuːɾ]) is the third largest city and the winter capital of the Indian state of Maharashtra.[17] It is the 13th largest city in India by population[18] and according to an Oxford's Economics report, Nagpur is projected to be the fifth fastest growing city in the world from 2019 to 2035 with an average growth of 8.41%.[19] It has been proposed as one of the Smart Cities in Maharashtra and is one of the top ten cities in India in Smart City Project execution.[20][21][22]
